Reviews.Title: “Not the worst, Not the best.”
Reviews.Author: Morgan N
Reviews.Content: friends college students drove memphis jack white concert decided book hotel relatively close beale street wasnt especially expensive stayed tuesday night quiet initially king sized bed instead doubles staff apologized switched locked key extra didnt wifi free breakfast planned world famous fried chicken anyway pros werent bad clean relatively nice looking bathrooms looked clean hotel staff friendly drive motel beale street short cons parking lot redone couldnt park directly outside pool empty pool ice machines vending machines probably hadnt front lobby renovated hotel sale wasnt exactly town morning sketchy people lurking mini fridge microwave overall price wasnt terrible youre college student friends staying night concert drinking beers partying little bit probably ideal stay night family hotel lot worse

Reviews.Title: “I'd rather sleep on the park bench ...”
Reviews.Author: Judy W
Reviews.Content: bookingcom book 3 nights hotel supposed include breakfast free wifi checking told breakfast served weekends printed confirmation meant breakfast mondays fridays free wifi okay wasnt told called isp fixed left stay bookingcom didnt except contacted hotel basically complaint episode badly managed hotel near noisy highway else

Reviews.Title: “AVOID, AVOID, AVOID!!!”
Reviews.Author: D_elle_D
Reviews.Content: outside hotel nice shown requested inspection placed initially shown stank bathroom sink clogged building materials cigarette butts strewn outside knocked door wee hours morning heard cops walking grounds nght feel safe pool covered toe anyway worst hotel stayed trip wish wed computer access check reviews stay dont werent warned

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it!”
Reviews.Author: Maureen H
Reviews.Content: jacked price 53night 1229 129night 1230 liberty bowl absolute rip continental breakfast bad coffee weird juice cold danish package shuttle beale street 350 person told cab expensive cab driver hotel 8 eve chose call cab especially decided werent run shuttle passing information check shuttle schedule 1231 lots students staying wasnt deal liberty bowl ran towels hotel towels piece cloth anyway prepared knowing sold front desk folks friendly didnt trolley system reasons chose paced begin trolley line beale definitely id stay doesnt town convenient beale street cab

Reviews.Title: “Do Not under any circumstance stay here Ever.”
Reviews.Author: nevereveragain_11
Reviews.Content: reservations quoted 120 night due beale street music arrived 3 2 towelsthey charged 10 extra filthy run cleaning lady told lock car left owner guests friends staying greeted recent hatch absolutely worst lodging availablei preferred joining homeless street corner researching whom report hotel stay alcohol memphis acceptable

Reviews.Title: “Don't even think about it even if you're saving money.”
Reviews.Author: thelooker
Reviews.Content: stayed family vacation average shower curtain yeah shower curtain call forever rude attitude informed red roof inn corp horrible experience told location red roof inn 2010 thank god corporate name
